channel.title: Volunteers Around the World at UCSC - Blog

item.title: 5/24/2017 KGI Presentation with Monica Cannon
item.description: Big thank you to KGI representative, Monica Cannon, for coming out from Claremont, California to give us more information about the Masters of Bioscience and Masters of Engineering Programs offered at their institute and to share with us her personal stories and experiences within the field.Please feel free to learn more about Keck Graduate Institute at http://www.kgi.edu/ or contact us for some of the brochures and posters that Monica had left us!  [...]
item.content:encoded:
Big thank you to KGI representative, Monica Cannon, for coming out from Claremont, California to give us more information about the Masters of Bioscience and Masters of Engineering Programs offered at their institute and to share with us her personal stories and experiences within the field.

Please feel free to learn more about Keck Graduate Institute at http://www.kgi.edu/ or contact us for some of the brochures and posters that Monica had left us!
